titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: CEREBRAL PALSY TYPE CODE (NATIONAL NEONATAL DATA SET) - Description

div.p: CEREBRAL PALSY TYPE CODE (NATIONAL NEONATAL DATA SET) is the same as attribute CEREBRAL PALSY TYPE CODE FOR NATIONAL NEONATAL DATA SET.
CEREBRAL PALSY TYPE CODE (NATIONAL NEONATAL DATA SET) should be recorded where the PATIENT DIAGNOSIS INDICATOR (CEREBRAL PALSY) Â is 'Yes'.
